localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
blogPost.body: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
blogPost.title: Insight Browser - Supercharge search & browsing on iOS with no-code extensions
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 互联网不是万能的，您的手机浏览器也不应该是万能的。有了Insight，您可以在手机上轻松快速地创建扩展程序，我们会在您浏览时推荐最有用的扩展程序。只搜索您信任的来源；阻止广告、跟踪器和垃圾。
localize.tagline: 在iOS系统上使用无代码扩展进行超级搜索和浏览

localize.description: 互聯網不是萬能的，您的手機瀏覽器也不應該是萬能的。有了Insight，您可以在手機上輕鬆快速地創建擴展程序，我們會在您瀏覽時推薦最有用的擴展程序。只搜索您信任的來源；阻止廣告、跟蹤器和垃圾。
localize.tagline: 在iOS系統上使用無代碼擴展進行超級搜索和瀏覽

previous.excerpt: Host Notes takes your plain Clubhouse event and transforms it into an event super-space. Collect RSVPs, collect tips, set an agenda, establish event rules, share relevant links and so much more all in a single click.
previous.title: Host Notes for Clubhouse - Take your Clubhouse events to the next level ⚡

localize.description: 主持人笔记将你的普通会所活动转化为一个超级活动空间。收集RSVP，收集提示，设置议程，建立活动规则，分享相关链接等等，所有这些都只需点击一下。
localize.tagline: 让您的会所活动更上一层楼 ⚡

localize.description: 主持人筆記將你的普通會所活動轉化爲一個超級活動空間。收集RSVP，收集提示，設置議程，建立活動規則，分享相關鏈接等等，所有這些都只需點擊一下。
localize.tagline: 讓您的會所活動更上一層樓 ⚡

next.excerpt: PDFs are cumbersome and challenging to manage with modern web technologies. The Anvil PDF API simplifies PDF filling, generation, and e-signing into RESTful endpoints, eliminating the pain of working with PDFs.
next.title: Anvil PDF API - A flexible API for creating, filling, and signing PDFs.

localize.description: PDFs是繁琐的，并且对现代网络技术的管理具有挑战性。Anvil PDF API简化了PDF的填充、生成和电子签名到RESTful终端，消除了使用PDF的痛苦。
localize.tagline: 一个灵活的API，用于创建、填充和签署PDF文件。

localize.description: PDFs是繁瑣的，並且對現代網絡技術的管理具有挑戰性。Anvil PDF API簡化了PDF的填充、生成和電子簽名到RESTful終端，消除了使用PDF的痛苦。
localize.tagline: 一個靈活的API，用於創建、填充和簽署PDF文件。
